member.name: M:MiddleEarthAPI.Controllers.AuthorController.GetAuthors
member.summary: Returns a list of the authors responsible for the Middle Earth books

member.name: M:MiddleEarthAPI.Controllers.AuthorController.GetAuthorById(System.Int32)

member.name: M:MiddleEarthAPI.Controllers.PublisherController.GetPublishers
